titles.title: Superfund Polluter Pays Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the financing of the Superfund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/16/2010--Introduced. Superfund Polluter Pays Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) reinstate and increase the Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate through 2018; and (2) increase the environmental excise tax on certain chemicals sold by their manufacturers, producers, and importers.
